<!-- Code generated by cmd/docsgen. DO NOT EDIT. -->

# Storage Endpoints

Storage credentials and external locations.

## `GET /external-locations`

List external locations

Returns a paginated list of external locations configured for remote storage access.

- Operation ID: `listExternalLocations`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of external locations |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /external-locations`

Create an external location

Creates a new external location and configures DuckDB with the associated credential. If this is the first location, the DuckLake catalog is attached. Requires ALL_PRIVILEGES on catalog.

- Operation ID: `createExternalLocation`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created location |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /external-locations/{locationName}`

Get an external location by name

Retrieves the details of a specific external location identified by its name.

- Operation ID: `getExternalLocation`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `locationName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the external location. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Location details |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `PATCH /external-locations/{locationName}`

Update an external location

Updates location fields. Requires ALL_PRIVILEGES on catalog.

- Operation ID: `updateExternalLocation`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `locationName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the external location. |

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Updated location |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /external-locations/{locationName}`

Delete an external location

Deletes a location and drops the associated DuckDB secret. Requires ALL_PRIVILEGES on catalog.

- Operation ID: `deleteExternalLocation`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `locationName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the external location. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Location deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /storage-credentials`

List storage credentials

Returns a paginated list of storage credentials. Sensitive fields (key_id, secret) are never returned.

- Operation ID: `listStorageCredentials`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of storage credentials |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /storage-credentials`

Create a storage credential

Creates a new storage credential. Requires ALL_PRIVILEGES on catalog.

- Operation ID: `createStorageCredential`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created credential (sensitive fields omitted) |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /storage-credentials/{credentialName}`

Get a storage credential by name

Returns credential metadata. Sensitive fields (key_id, secret) are never returned.

- Operation ID: `getStorageCredential`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `credentialName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the storage credential. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Credential details |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
